text: Adesh Kanwarjit Singh Brar was a Congress MLA from Punjab. He was the son of former Chief Minister of Punjab, Harcharan Singh Brar. He completed his schooling from The Doon School (1957). Under-Graduated from Punjab Agricultural University with B.Sc(1960) and Graduated From Cornell University Agriculture and Life Sciences (M.P.S.) (1966) USA. Became an MLA in 1977, 2007 respectively.
